doc.field: Series I: Spanish Civil War Posters from the Abraham Lincoln Brigade Archives Collection, 1936-2003.
Subseries I:A: Civil War Era: Spain, 1936-1938.
Series I: Spanish Civil War Posters from the Abraham Lincoln Brigade Archives Collection, 1936-2003.
Subseries I:A: Civil War Era: Spain, 1936-1938.

"El obrero ignorante forja sus propias cadenas. Sindicatos obreros: Que no haya un solo analfabeto en vuestras filas." [Published by]  Sindicato Provincial de Maestros [de] Madrid F.E.T.E (U.G.T.). Imprint "Graficas Reunidas U.H.P. Madrid." H: 45 x W: 31 inches.
